question: What is a Report Data Source (RDS) in Workday reporting?
options: The visual layout of a report
The tables and fields that supply the rows displayed in a report
The security groups that can view a report
The default sort order for a report

question: How does a Primary Business Object (PBO) differ from a Related Business Object (RBO)?
options: A PBO is always numeric, while an RBO is text
A PBO drives each row of the report; an RBO provides additional linked data
A PBO can only be a Worker object, whereas an RBO can be any object
A PBO is optional, but an RBO is required for every report

question: Which component defines the column definitions that can be selected for a report?
What does the term “Instance” refer to in the context of a Workday report?
options: A saved version of the report definition
Each row returned by the report, representing one PBO record
The user who runs the report
The database server processing the request
